5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Abu Qatada reported that when the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was in a journey he got down for rest at night, and he used to lie down on his right side, and when he lay down for rest before the dawn, he used to stretch his forearm and place his head over his palm

chapter.ara-name: باب قَضَاءِ الصَّلاَةِ الْفَائِتَةِ وَاسْتِحْبَابِ تَعْجِيلِ قَضَائِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Making up a missed prayer. And it is recommended to hasten to make it up
